response_parsed.title: Serverless Handlers with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to create and deploy a simple serverless API using FastAPI, Uvicorn, and AWS Lambda in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Install FastAPI, Uvicorn, and required packages for AWS Lambda
Create an API endpoint with FastAPI
Package the application as a deployable ZIP file
Configure an AWS Lambda function using Python 3.12 runtime
Deploy the function to AWS Lambda

code_examples.code: pip install fastapi uvicorn boto3 aws-lambda-invoker

version_notes: Python 3.12 is required for AWS Lambda support
Uvicorn 0.18.0 or later for serverless support
caveats: Ensure the function's timeout and memory settings are appropriate for your use case
Lambda layers can be used to manage dependencies across multiple functions
Consider using API Gateway to expose your Lambda function as a RESTful service
